alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 4:29PM EDT until June 04 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... North central Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 428 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles west of Crawfordville, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Poplar Camp, Morgan Place, Smith Creek, Nixon Garden, Twin Pole, Central City, Sanborn and Owens Bridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
